name: First Impressions (bryanwinters)
description:
Our submission for TOJam Hindsight is 2020 under the theme of "Together but apart"! We made a social dating (adjacent) party game!! Download the client and run it, share your screen or stream it to have people join into your game via room code!

The hot new dating app SMOOSH is looking for community input on user profiles and is selecting people to submit what they think people look like! Go through three SMOOSH user profiles and answer the prompt "This person looks like..."
- A good friend
- They call their mom everyday
- They listen to SKA music
- The perfect lover

The fun and funnies are up to you! ENJOY!!

Enter a room code here: http://remotegoat.games/

Credits:
Game Coding: Bryan Winters (bryanwinters)
Web Coding: John Vieira (devvex)
Art: Mel Maduro (@MelMaduro)


NOTE: We're working on uploading other platform builds!
